org.gridgain.grid.spi.swapspace.leveldb
Interface GridLevelDbSwapSpaceSpiMBean

All Superinterfaces:
GridSpiManagementMBean
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridLevelDbSwapSpaceSpi
@GridMBeanDescription(value="MBean that provides administrative and configuration information on LevelDB-based swapspace SPI.")
public interface GridLevelDbSwapSpaceSpiMBean
extends GridSpiManagementMBean

Management bean for GridLevelDbSwapSpaceSpi.

isPersistent

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Flag controlling whether swap space should survive restarts.")
boolean isPersistent()
Gets flag controlling whether swap space should survive restarts.

Returns:
True if data must not be deleted at SPI stop, otherwise false.

getEvictOverflowRatio

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Eviction overflow ratio.")
double getEvictOverflowRatio()
Gets swap space eviction overflow ratio. Evictions will start when swap space entry count overgrows allowed maximum by this ratio.

Returns:
cntOverflowRatio Overflow ratio.

getEvictFrequency

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Eviction frequency (in milliseconds).")
long getEvictFrequency()
Gets eviction frequency (in milliseconds) set for swap spaces.

Returns:
evictFrequency Eviction frequency in milliseconds.

getEvictPolicyFormatted

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Eviction policy.")
String getEvictPolicyFormatted()
Gets eviction policy set for swap spaces.

Returns:
evictPolicy Eviction policy converted to string string to avoid need of corresponding class in tool classpath.
